Producer: David Valleau, Silvio Muraglia, Fredrik Malmberg, Frank Buchs, Daniel Wagner
Production Co: South Creek Pictures, Bavariapool International Coproductions
Synopsis: A prosecutor (Dominic Cooper) commits a fatal hit-and-run, then manipulates the case so that the man who was arrested for the crime is acquitted. After the trial, he discovers that his actions have freed a guilty man.
Title: Reasonable Doubt
